name: Duke Nukem 3D
description:
This script will install more than hundred "Duke Nukem 3D" bonus levels for EDuke32.
Credits:
Big thanks to NightFright: 
https://forums.duke4.net/topic/7640-release-eduke32-addon-compilation/
and to the guys at Duke4.net:
http://hrp.duke4.net/
notes:
- This script will not install "Duke Nukem 3D" nor EDuke32, only bonus levels provided by FrightNight. Before to launch this script, one of this scripts "Steam + EDuke32", "All versions + EDuke32" or "GOG + EDuke32" needs to be installed.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
extends: duke-nukem-3d
files:
- fngt:
    filename: addons.exe
    url: https://www.dropbox.com/s/eixab4972tx6ork/eduke32_addons313.exe?dl=1
- dznii:
    filename: dukezoneii.zip
    url: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0tf8oaqozuy58te/dukezone2.zip?dl=1
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/dn3d/addons/frightnight
    src: fngt
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/dn3d/addons/frightnight/
    src: dznii
